{"id":344447482,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 years, 3 months","timestamp":1590411747,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"36 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/344447482/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n       int start =0;\n        int end =0;\n        map <char,int> m;\n        map <char,int >::iterator it ;\n        int max_len =0;\n        while(end <s.size()){\n            char c = s[end];\n            it =m.find(c);\n            if(it!=m.end() && it->second >= start && it->second <end){\n                start =it->second+1;\n            }\n            m[c]=end++;\n            max_len=max(max_len,end-start);\n        }\n        return max_len;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
